content: r22 chain 1 skip same st work * 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts do not notes work in same st on 1st repeat 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat from * to end join to 1st single_crochet 70 r11 & r17 chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet * 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end join to 1st single_crochet 70 r12 & r18 accent row chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st & in each st to end join to 1st single_crochet 70 r13 & r19 chain 2 skip same st work 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts * 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat from * to end join to top of beg chain 2 70 r14 & r20 chain 2 work 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet * 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end join to top of beg chain 2 70 r15 & r21 accent row chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st & in each st to end join to 1st single_crochet 70 r16 - r22 repeat r10 - r15 then r10 again for a longer slouchier beanie continue with pattern repeating r11 r12 r13… until desired length always end after an r10 or r13 repeat work edging as below r23 chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st & in each st to end join to 1st single_crochet 70 if you had fun with this free r24 chain 1 work 1 half_double_crochet in same st & in each st to end join to 1st half_double_crochet 70 pattern be sure to check my shop for other
